channel.title: Comments on: Interview: Hamid, Stardom, and the Difference Threshold
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: Max S.
item.dc:creator: Max S.
item.description: delicious read, soph. lets go dancing with hamid!!
item.content:encoded: delicious read, soph. lets go dancing with hamid!!

item.title: By: collidoscope berlin
item.dc:creator: collidoscope berlin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="http://collidoscopeberlin.local/2013/11/30/interview-hamid-stardom-and-the-difference-threshold/#comment-438">thediplomaticwife</a>.
Ha, great question! The answer is yes, Hamid does a great job and it's very reasonably priced.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to thediplomaticwife.

Ha, great question! The answer is yes, Hamid does a great job and it’s very reasonably priced.

item.title: By: thediplomaticwife
item.dc:creator: thediplomaticwife
item.description: I need to ask, only because I badly need a stylist that won't break the bank. How did you like your hair cut? Haha!
item.content:encoded: I need to ask, only because I badly need a stylist that won’t break the bank. How did you like your hair cut? Haha!
